Sad movie, not as good as the trailer, some parts were filler.
Shitty parenting and lazy government employees pissed me off.  The bus driver should tell these kids to sitdown and shutup crabtree style.

it's sad that kids as young as 11 are taking their own lives as a result of bullying... teachers and bus drivers need to be doing more to prevent this stuff from happening.
